name: Birdy Clone
description:
A clone of a popular mobile game, created in Unity 2021. It's a small project made in a few days, to reacquaint myself with the engine after switching to Linux. It is, essentially, Flappy Bird, just with mobile colors. It's not really any more fun to play than the original, so don't bother.

What's different from the original, however, is what this project is open source, so you can look, touch, modify and scoff at it for absolutely free right here!

Otherwise, I'll appreciate you playing it.
